description: We do not want this enabled by default. A user should specify whether or not XenAPI should attempt to mount and inject information to the guest.
title: flat_injected should be False by default

comments.content: We do not want this enabled by default. A user should specify whether or not XenAPI should attempt to mount and inject information to the guest.
